jobDescription: A fun - loving, engineer who loves the outdoors
aboutText: My name is Aarnav Sanghvi, and I am a UI/UX Designer with a passion for engineering and the outdoors. I bring a combination of technical knowledge and creative design skills to my work. With experience in programming languages such as C++ and C#, as well as Figma, I am able to develop innovative solutions that meet user needs. My hobbies of water polo, skiing, and hiking have also provided me with the opportunity to explore the outdoors, develop my design skills, and hone my creativity. As a fun-loving engineer, I strive to combine my technical knowledge, creative design skills, and outdoor experiences to develop projects that are both practical and visually appealing.

projects.title: MessagingApp
projects.description: A project that contains a server, as well as a client application for two clients to chat via tcp
